p: The experimental dehydrogenation enthalpies for reactions (34) and (35) are 70 ± 2 and 81 ± 2 kJ/mol H 2, respectively [ 167]. A phase diagram was generated with these values ( Figure 10). In this diagram, the feasibility of hydrogenation at low pressure is evident and it justifies the rehydrogenation without the need for a catalyst or additives.
